mobs.long_desc: The Larva Worm slithers around here.
mobs.desc: The sickly larva glares menacingly at you, evil intentions in its eyes.

mobs.long_desc: The Larva Worm slithers around here.
mobs.desc: The sickly larva glares menacingly at you, evil intentions in its eyes.

The skeleton is of a humanoid creature, with empty eyesockets and very dry bones that somehow stick together and allow it to move around and walk. It stands inert unless something attracts it, its arms at its sides.

mobs.long_desc: The Lesser Shade lurks in the shadows here, barely visible.
mobs.desc: The Lesser Shade lurks in the shadows here, barely visible to the naked eye.
This is a very tough looking skeleton. It seems to be aware of you.

mobs.long_desc: The Skeletal Warrior stands here, silently observing you.
mobs.desc: This is an extremely tough looking skeleton. It seems to be more than just aware of its surroundings. The warrior is intelligently observing your every action. Its hollow eye sockets looking straight into the depths of your being.

mobs.long_desc: The Large Shade stands here, wrapped in shadow.
mobs.desc: The Large Shade stands here, wrapped in shadows. It glares at you as you draw closer, making it look very unfriendly.

mobs.long_desc: The Large Shade stands here, wrapped in shadow.
mobs.desc: The Large Shade stands here, wrapped in shadows. It glares at you as you draw closer, making it look very unfriendly.

mobs.long_desc: The Great Shade shimmers in and out of existence.
mobs.desc: The Great Shade shimmers in and out of existence.  It appears to have almost total control over the shadows in this area.  It looks at you with murderous intentions evident in its eyes...  Perhaps you should retreat now?

mobs.long_desc: The Large Worm slithers around here.
mobs.desc: The large worm glares menacingly at you, evil intentions in its eyes.

mobs.long_desc: Something seems to be moving in the mists here.
mobs.desc: You can barely see him, but it appears to be a humanoid of some sort garbed all in grey, so as to almost disappear in the mists.

mobs.keywords: highpriest evil high priest mist pillar smoky smokey
mobs.long_desc: The mists seem to form a smoky pillar in the center of the room.
mobs.desc: The high priest has given himself completely over to evil, and has absorbed some of the powers of the mists. It is difficult to see him clearly, as he is partially mist, but his evil is pure and obvious.

mobs.long_desc: A slobbering, short, twisted humanoid stands here.
mobs.desc: Whatever it is, it's ugly!  It is a gaunt, short hairless humanoid with pale white skin. Spittle runs between the many small fangs in its mouth.

mobs.long_desc: A bloated pale white humanoid stands here.
mobs.desc: This thing is ghastly! It has bloated pale white skin and some disgusting liquid is oozing from its eyes. Large claws and sharp teeth don't exactly make this creature look cute and cuddly either!

mobs.long_desc: A twisted malformed humanoid stands here.
mobs.desc: This is truly a pathetic looking creature. It somewhat resembles a twisted, malformed, and terribly ugly human. It has a pointed skull, distorted features, and backward-pointing ears!

objects.ground: A small silver stud lies here.

extras.text: This simple silver stud is a perfect a lustrous accessory.

objects.ground: A set of dark red vambraces barely catches your attention.

extras.text: Plates of iron burnished dark red and bound together with chain.

rooms.name: An unfinished room
rooms.description: You are in an unfinished room.

rooms.name: The Misty Dark Passage
rooms.description: You are in a dark, misty passageway.  To the west, you see what appears to be a forest path and normal life.  To the east, the passageway descends into a misty darkness.  The entire area appears to have been constructed recently by someone or something that simply decided to burn its way through to the surface world.  There is some writing on the wall.  A shimmering portal lies to the east.

extras.text: Beware! Unknown evils lie below... --Stratos GreyCloak
The portal appears to shimmer in and out of existance, as if not entirely of this world. Perhaps it leads to some OTHER world? Looks easy enough to open.

rooms.name: The Misty Entrance Room
rooms.description: You have entered a room filled with mists not of this world.  It is difficult to see very well in here, but the only exit appears to be to the east.  You do notice a shimmering portal to the west, the way back to your own world.

extras.text: The portal appears to shimmer in and out of existance, as if not entirely of this world. Perhaps it leads to some OTHER world? Looks easy enough to open.

rooms.name: The Misty Rough-Hewn Passage
rooms.description: This area is also filled with other-worldly mists, but the entire surface of the room appears to be very rough-hewn, even more so than the entrance to this strange foreboding place.  As you enter, the floor squishes beneath your feet and you hear slithering sounds from somewhere in or nearby this room.  You get the feeling that someone or something is observing you as you walk about.

rooms.name: The Edge of the Misty Chasm
rooms.description: You are now certain that you have left your own world far behind.  The sheer thickness of the air makes breathing difficult, but you know you do not want to turn back now.  You can continue your descent to the east or retreat this strange place by returning west.  The mists rise from a chasm to the south. It doesn't look like going south would be a particularly good idea.

rooms.name: An unfinished room
rooms.description: You are in an unfinished room.

rooms.name: An unfinished room
rooms.description: You are in an unfinished room.

rooms.name: The Misty Intersection
rooms.description: This is a misty intersection, with the northern exit sloping sharply upwards out of the mists.  The misty passages continue to the south, east, and west.

rooms.name: The Bone-White Archway
rooms.description: You are standing in a bone-white archway.  The walls here glow eerily. Another bone-white passageway continues to the north.  To the south the tunnel roughens and descends into the mists.

rooms.name: The Bone-White Intersection
rooms.description: You are standing in a bone-white four-way intersection.  The walls here glow eerily.  White passageways continue on to the west and south.  The passages to the north and east are not as well lit, seeming almost murky in atmosphere.

rooms.name: The Murky Well Room
rooms.description: This is a murky little room of seemingly little significance, but you notice what appears to be a well of some sort descending into the darkness below. There is a ladder in the well.  You should be able to climb out of the well later, should you decide to go down now.

rooms.name: The Bone-White Turn in the Passage
rooms.description: You are standing in a bone-white passageway with exits to the north and east.  The total silence here is very disturbing.  It's almost as if something is just waiting to happen here soon.

rooms.name: The Bone-White Passage
rooms.description: You are standing in another bone-white passageway, running north to south.

rooms.name: The Bone-White Bend in the Passage
rooms.description: You are standing in a bone-white passageway with exits to the south and east.  Like the rest of the bone-white areas you have encountered so far, this area is also bone dry.  Very odd considering the mists you saw when you entered.

rooms.name: The Murky T-Crossing
rooms.description: This murky T-crossing appears quite odd.  The walls appear to be made of the same substance as the bony-white glowing areas you have already seen, but the walls here seem to have been converted, so to speak, to absorb light, rather than radiate it.  The walls seem to absorb even the light you carry with you. The murkiness continues to the east, or you can return to the light by the north and south exits.

rooms.name: The Bone-White T-Cross
rooms.description: You are standing in a bone-white T-crossing with exits to the north, south, and west.  The southern exit appears to be not as well lit as this area, or the areas to the north and west for that matter.

rooms.name: The Bone-White Passageway
rooms.description: This bone-white passageway runs straight north and south.

rooms.name: The Bone-White Echo Chamber
rooms.description: This bone-white room has exits to the south and east.  Sorrowful moaning can be heard echoing from the eastern exit, which is dark and murky.  The way to the south appears to be lit by the same eerily glowing walls that light this room.

rooms.name: The Murky T-Cross
rooms.description: This T-Cross is quite difficult to see in.  To the east you can just barely make out some light and the murkiness continues to the north and west.

rooms.name: The Murky Corner
rooms.description: You nearly walk into a wall as you enter this dark murky area.  You find yourself facing into a corner.  This area is definitely damp, unlike the bony-white areas you have seen previously.  The murkiness continues on to the south and the east.

rooms.name: The Murky Depths
rooms.description: This appears to be a room, but the murkiness makes it difficult to see anything at all.  This is definitely the murkiest room of them all.  You can barely see the outline of your light source as you move around the room.  The floor is covered by a thin sheet of freezing cold water.  The cold causes your toes to tingle..  There is more murkiness to the north and west of here, although it is difficult to see much else.

rooms.name: The Murky Room
rooms.description: The walls of this room are made of the same murky substance as the surrounding areas.  It almost seems to be a living entity as it seeks to extinguish your light source.  It is definitely wet in here.  Your ankles can attest to that fact, as they are now underwater.  You can just make out the murkiness continuing to the north and south.

rooms.name: The Murky Bend
rooms.description: This bend in the passageway goes west and south from here.  Unlike the other bony-white areas you have seen so far, this area appears to be slightly damp. The murky walls seem almost alive as they reach out to snuff the light daring to intrude into the living darkness of this area.

rooms.name: The Murky Entrance
rooms.description: This room is very different from the bone-white areas you have seen. Although the walls appear to have been made of the same ivory like substance, they seem to have been "converted" to absorb light, rather than provide it. Even the light source you carry appears to be weakened in this room.  The murkiness continues to the north and east, or you can return to the light to the west.

rooms.name: The Murky Turn in the Passageway
rooms.description: Even with the light you have brought with you, this area is difficult to see.  It is murky here.  The walls seemingly absorbing whatever light enters. To the south the murkiness continues.  From the east you can just make out the sounds of crunching, as if something were being trod under weighty feet. Dimly, you can see light entering this area from the east as well.

rooms.name: The Skeletal Passageway
rooms.description: The floor of this passageway is covered by bony debris.  The walls seem to be made from solid ivory, covered by intricate carvings of skeletal figures of all kinds.  Your light flickers wildly in the mild breeze, seeming to give the figures a life of their own.

rooms.name: The Skeletal Arena
rooms.description: The first thing you notice about this room is its pearly white walls and floor.  The ceiling vaults high above, far beyond the range of your vision. Carved into every inch of the walls are skeletal figures of every kind.  Your light flickers wildly in the mild breeze, seeming to give the figures a life of their own.  They seem to be moving slowly towards you.

rooms.name: The Skeletal Entrance
rooms.description: The floor of this room is covered by bony debris.  The walls appear to have been carved from ivory, with ghoulish looking skeletons carved into every inch of the room.  Your light flickers wildly in a gentle breeze, which seems to give the carvings a life of their own.

rooms.name: The Skeletal Treasure Vault
rooms.description: You are in a rather bare looking vault.  It has been obviously looted several times before, leaving little behind for you to discover here.

rooms.name: Inside the Murky Well
rooms.description: You are holding on to a ladder set into the side of a murky well.  You can easily climb up or down from here to see what lies beyond.

rooms.name: The Bend in the Misty Passage
rooms.description: You have entered a bend in the misty tunnels, with exits to the west and south.  The mists are no longer bright here, becoming a dark vapourous mass, almost as if they were free-floating shadows drifting through the area.

rooms.name: The Dark Bend in the Tunnels
rooms.description: This is another bend in the dark tunnels, with exits to the north and east.

rooms.name: The Dark T-Crossing
rooms.description: The dark tunnels T here, with exits to the north, south, and west.  From the north, low sorrowful moaning can be heard.  To the south, all seems quiet.

rooms.name: The Dark Tunnel
rooms.description: The dark tunnel runs north to south here.  You continue to hear low inhuman moaning sounds emanating from the northern tunnels.

rooms.name: The Turn in the Dark Tunnels
rooms.description: The dark vapours are quite dense here, in the turning passageway.  Exits lead to the east and south, with strange sounds drifting into this area from the tunnel entrance to the east.

rooms.name: The Dark T-Cross
rooms.description: The dark tunnels T here, with exits to the north, east, and west.  Inhuman moaning sounds can be heard coming from the northern tunnel while other strange inhuman sounds are emanating from the eastern tunnels.

rooms.name: The Entrance to the Shadowy Lair
rooms.description: You have entered the entrance to a shadowy looking lair.  You can catch no more than a quick glimpse of the shadowy creatures within, as they quickly slip in and out of the shadows within.  The lair is to the east, or you can retreat back into the tunnels to the south.

rooms.name: The Shadowy Lair (SW)
rooms.description: You are now inside of the shadowy lair, but the creatures you saw are no easier to see from here.  You catch only occassional glimpses of untold numbers of these shadowy figures as they seem to step in and out of this realm of existance.  Their dark eyes seem to track your every step.  The lair continues on to the north and east, or you can leave the lair from here by entering the tunnels to the west.

rooms.name: The Shadowy Lair (SE)
rooms.description: The floor is covered in what feels like gravel here, and the entire area is cloaked by shadowy mists.  The lair continues on to the north and west.

rooms.name: The Shadowy Lair (NE)
rooms.description: The ceiling appears to have collapsed here a very long time ago, leaving gravel-like fragments strewn across the floor here, as well as to the south and western parts of the lair.  The shadows seem darkest on top of a large pile of gravel in the center of this area.

rooms.name: The Shadowy Lair (NW)
rooms.description: The floor is covered with what feels like gravel here, and the entire area is cloaked in dark shadowy mists.  The lair continues on to the south and east.

rooms.name: The Entrance to the Cackling Cavern
rooms.description: To the south of here you can hear the evil inhuman cackling of some otherworldly creature or creatures.  The dark tunnels run east and west from this entranceway.  To the west, you can hear low moaning noises and from the east emanates the sounds of scraping and scratching.

rooms.name: The Lair of the Large Shades
rooms.description: The shadowy vapours are especially thick here, some of them seem to be more than just shadows, though.  They appear to be very much aware of the area and the intruders (you) that have entered their domain.

rooms.name: The Cackling Cavern (NW)
rooms.description: You have now entered the Cackling Caverns.  You are surrounded by the sounds of inhuman cackling as you watch creatures slip in and out of the shadowy vapours that seem to common to this area.  The caverns continue on to the east and south or you can enter a smaller cavern to the west.

rooms.name: The Cackling Cavern (NE)
rooms.description: Inhuman cackling seems to emanate from the very walls of this cavern, or perhaps it's only the terrible echoing that makes it seem this way.  The caverns continue on to the south and west.

rooms.name: The Cackling Cavern (SW)
rooms.description: Creatures continue to slip in and out of the shadows here as the cackling echoes on around you.  The caverns continue on to the north and east.

rooms.name: The Cackling Cavern (SE)
rooms.description: The cackling is especially loud here and the strange shadowy creatures you have seen elsewhere in this cavern are here as well.  They seem to be able to slip in and out of this shadowy world at will.  To the south, the darkness seems especially evil.  The caverns continue on to the north and west as well.

rooms.name: The Lair of the Great Shade
rooms.description: The overwhelming evil emanating from every square inch of this room is so powerful it makes you feel sick to your stomach.  An evil low chuckling sound seems to come from some unknown part of the room and you are certain that someone or something is observing you for its evil amusement.  Whatever it is, you are certain that it does not feel the least bit threatened by you...

rooms.name: The North Entrance to the Scraping Tunnels
rooms.description: You can hear scraping and scratching noises from the south.  To the west, cackling and moaning can be heard.  In both directions, the ever-present dark mists can be seen floating through the tunnels.

rooms.name: The Scraping Tunnels (NW)
rooms.description: The sound of scraping and scratching seem to surround you here.  Where they come from is impossible to determine.  The floors here are soft and squishy, though.  The strange tunnels continue on to the south and east, or you can leave this strange area to the north.

rooms.name: The Scraping Tunnels (NE)
rooms.description: Scratching and scraping sounds continue to surround you in these strange tunnels, coming from some mysterious source.  The floors are soft and squishy here as well.  The strange tunnels continue on to the west and south.

rooms.name: The Scraping Tunnels (SW)
rooms.description: It seems fairly obvious to you now that something lives here that burrows through the squishy substance you are standing on, causing the mysterious echoing scraping and scratching noises.  The strange tunnels continue on to the north and east from here.

rooms.name: The Scraping Tunnels (SE)
rooms.description: Scraping and scratching noises seem to emanate from the very walls of these tunnels, echoing wildly in all directions.  The floor here is strangely soft and squishy as well.  You can continue through the tunnels to the north or west, or you can leave this area by heading south.

rooms.name: The South Entrance to the Scraping Tunnels
rooms.description: To the north, you can hear strange scraping and scratching sounds.  The dark tunnels continue on to the west from here as well.  The dark mists surround you.

rooms.name: The Bend in the Soft Tunnel
rooms.description: The tunnel bends here, with exits to the east and south.  Mysterious scraping and scratching noises are emanating from the tunnels to east.

rooms.name: The Turn in the Soft Tunnel
rooms.description: The floor in this turn of the tunnel is soft, obviously not solid stone. From the north you hear scraping and scratching sounds from some unknown creature.  All is quiet to the west.

rooms.name: The Soft Tunnel
rooms.description: The floor here is soft, as if it were not made entirely of stone.  From the west, you hear the faint sounds of scraping or scratching.  To the east, all is deathly still and quiet.

rooms.name: The Bend in the Quiet Tunnel
rooms.description: The tunnel bends here, with exits to the north and east.  Not a sound is to be heard here, it is completely quiet.  You can even hear your own heartbeat.

rooms.name: The Quiet Tunnel
rooms.description: All is deathly quiet in this north-south tunnel.

rooms.name: The Turn in the Quiet Tunnel
rooms.description: The tunnel turns here, with exits to the west and south.  All is quiet.

rooms.name: The Bend in the Dark Tunnels
rooms.description: The dark tunnels bend here, with exits to the north and east.  To the north, you can hear the faint sounds of moaning, but to the east everything seems strangely quiet -- almost too quiet.

rooms.name: Writing on the Walls
rooms.description: The mists in this room bog you down as much as any of the rooms you have seen up until now.  There is some glowing writing inscribed on the western wall.  The passageway continues on to the north and south.

extras.text: The evil seems to be strongest to the south. Be careful! --Stratos GreyCloak

rooms.name: The Dark Intersection
rooms.description: You are standing in a dark intersection.  The mists seem to be lighter here, but not a lot lighter.  You can hear the echoing of the chasm to the west, and the tunnels continue on north, south, and east of here.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Winding Tunnel
rooms.description: You are standing in a turn in a winding passageway.  The passage ends just west of here at an intersection, or you can continue on to the south.  The mists are noticably lighter to the south and are slightly thicker to the west of this area.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Winding Tunnel
rooms.description: You are standing in a turn in a long, winding tunnel.  The mists are noticable lighter here.  The tunnel continues on to the north and east.

rooms.name: Another Turn in the Winding Tunnel
rooms.description: You are standing in another turn in a long, winding tunnel.  Perhaps that is WHY they call this a winding tunnel!  The mists are noticably lighter here, almost non-existant.  The tunnel continues on to the west and south from this spot.

rooms.name: Yet Another Turn in the Winding Tunnel
rooms.description: You are standing in yet another turn in this long winding passageway.  The mists are almost totally non-existant here, but they seem to be a bit stronger to the north and west of this area.

rooms.name: Another Turn in the Winding Tunnel
rooms.description: You are standing in another turn in this long, winding tunnel.  The mists are much lighter here, but still heavy enough to slow down your progress.  The winding tunnel continues on to the east and south of here.

rooms.name: Another Turn in the Winding Tunnel
rooms.description: You are standing in another turn in this long, winding passageway.  The mists are a bit lighter here, but still thick enough to slow down your movement quite a bit.  The winding tunnel continues on to the north and west from here.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Winding Tunnel
rooms.description: You are standing in a turn in a long, winding passageway.  The mists are slightly lighter here, but not enough to make your movement any easier.  The winding tunnel continues on to the north and east.

rooms.name: The End of the Winding Tunnel
rooms.description: You are standing at the end, or start, of a long, winding passageway.  To the north, you can see some dark tunnels, with heavy mists in them, or you can follow the winding tunnel to the south.

rooms.name: The Dark T-Crossing
rooms.description: You are standing in at a T-crossing in the Dark Tunnel.  The tunnels continue on to the north, south, and west of here.  The mists look like they might be lighter to the south, for some reason.

rooms.name: The Entrance to the Mist Temple
rooms.description: You are standing in the entrance to a dark temple.  The temple proper is just south of this spot, and a dark tunnel is to the east.  Thick mists roll into this area from the north and west.

rooms.name: The Mist Temple
rooms.description: You are standing in a dark and evil temple.  The mist seems to thrive here, taking on an evil life of its own.  The floor is pure obsidian, pure blackness. You can venture deeper into this small temple of evil to the west or south, or you can retreat to the north.

rooms.name: The Mist Temple
rooms.description: You are standing in a dark and evil temple.  The floor here is of the very purest obsidian and utterly black in colour.  The mist rises thickly from the north, flooding into this room like a sentient being.  You can work your way around the temple's edge to the east and west, or you can also go south, but the feeling of pure evil emanating from that direction may cause you to rethink that course of action...  More than a couple times!

rooms.name: The Mist Temple
rooms.description: You are standing in a dark and evil temple.  The feelings of pure evil surround you here.  The mist rolls into this room from the north and west, making the black obsidian floor here very slippery.  You can work your way around the outskirts of the temple by heading east or south from this spot.

rooms.name: The Mist Temple
rooms.description: You are standing in a dark and evil temple.  The floor here is pure obsidian and the very purest black in colour, absorbing as much light as it can.  The mist billows into this room from the west.  You can skirt around the edge of the temple to the north and south, or you can march directly into the heart of this evil temple to the east.

rooms.name: The Mist Temple
rooms.description: You are standing in a dark and evil temple.  From the west, mists swirl up into this room, moving as if it had a life of its own.  Pure black in colour, the obsidian floor obliterates all light that reaches it.  From here, you can continue to skirt around the edge of the temple to the north and east.

rooms.name: The Mist Temple
rooms.description: You are standing in a dark and evil temple.  The mists here seem to slowly sway to and fro, dancing almost hypnotically.  You can skirt around the edge of the temple to the east and west, or you can get to the heart of the matter to the north.

rooms.name: The Mist Temple Altar
rooms.description: You are standing in the heart of a dark and evil temple.  The mist seems to be drawn into this room from all the surrounding areas and the smell of fresh blood fills the air.  Your light sources flicker and are nearly extinguished by some combination of the mists and winds in here.

rooms.name: The Mist Temple
rooms.description: You are standing in a dark and evil temple.  The mists here are dense, but not much worse than you have seen in other areas.  However, these mists make the black obsidian floor slippery and footing treacherous.  You can continue skirting about the edge of the temple to the north and south, or you can make for the heart of the temple to the west.

rooms.name: The Mist Temple
rooms.description: You are standing in a dark and evil temple.  The floor here is made of the purest black obsidian you have ever seen.  The mists here swirl and hinder your movement, as they have since you came into this area.  You can leave the temple from here by heading east, or you can make your way around the outskirts of the temple to the north and west.

rooms.name: The Mist Temple Exit
rooms.description: You are standing just beyond a dark and evil temple here.  You can enter the temple to the west, or you can make your way deeper into the caverns to the east.  The mists seem to be getting thinner to the east.

rooms.name: The Beginning of the Obsidian Tunnel
rooms.description: You are standing at the beginning of a long obsidian passageway.  The tunnel runs off well into the distance to the east, and ends at the exit to the Dark Temple to the west.

rooms.name: The Obsidian Tunnel
rooms.description: You are standing in an east to west running obsidian tunnel.  This tunnel begins just west of here, and there is a turn in the tunnel just east of this spot.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Obsidian Tunnel
rooms.description: The obsidian tunnel turns here, and continues on to the north and west.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Obsidian Tunnel
rooms.description: There is a bend in the obsidian tunnel here.  You can continue on to the south and east from this spot.

rooms.name: The Obsidian Tunnel
rooms.description: You are standing in an east to west running section of an obsidian tunnel. To the west, the tunnel turns south, or you can continue on to the east from here.

rooms.name: The Obsidian Tunnel Dead-End
rooms.description: The obsidian tunnel ends suddenly here.  The only exit is to the east.

rooms.name: The Obsidian Tunnel
rooms.description: You are standing in an east to west running section of an obsidian tunnel here.  There is a T-crossing a short ways to the east.

rooms.name: The Obsidian Tunnel T-crossing
rooms.description: The obsidian tunnel splits here, running off in three directions.  From here, you can follow the tunnel north, south, or west.  The tunnel turns suddenly to the north and south, but continues on to the west for a bit.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Obsidian Tunnel
rooms.description: You are standing in a turn in an obsidian tunnel.  From here, the tunnel runs to the north and west.  Just north of here is a T-crossing.

rooms.name: The Obsidian Tunnel
rooms.description: The obsidian tunnels continues on to the east and west from here.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Obsidian Tunnel
rooms.description: The obsidian tunnel turns here, running on to the east and south.  There is a T-crossing just south of here, and the tunnel turns again to the east.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Obsidian Tunnel
rooms.description: You are standing in a turn in the obsidian tunnel.  From here, the tunnel runs on to the south and west, where is turns again.

rooms.name: The Obsidian Tunnel
rooms.description: You are standing in a north to south running section of the obsidian tunnel. The tunnel turns to the north and appears to end south of here.

rooms.name: The End of the Obsidian Tunnel
rooms.description: The obsidian tunnel ends here, running on to the north.  There is a metal ladder here, descending into the depths from here, but maybe using it wouldn't be such a good idea..

rooms.name: On a Ladder in a Hot Pit
rooms.description: You are hanging onto a hot metal ladder, slowly descending into the depths. You can climb up and out of this pit, or you can continue on down into the depths below.
